item.title: COMMUNICATIONS SYSTEMS (HF) – HIGH FREQUENCY (HF) COMMUNICATION SYSTEM – ONE INOPERATIVE – SATCOM OPERATIVE

remarks.para: May be inoperative while conducting operations that require two LRCS provided:

numlitem.para: SATCOM Voice or Data Link is operative,
Alternate procedures are established and used,
SATCOM coverage is available over intended route of flight, and
If Inmarsat codes are not available while using SATCOM voice, prior coordination with appropriate ATS facility is required.

note.para: SATCOM is to be used only as a backup to normal HF communication unless otherwise authorized by appropriate ATS facilities.

numlitem.para: Maintain company communications with appropriate facility.

placard.para: Placard affected system "HF INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
